description: Describes Sender additional and extensible attributes defined in the NMOS Parameter Registers.
title: Sender resource

bit_rate.description: Bit rate, in kilobits/second. Integer value expressed in units of 1000 bits per second, rounding up.

st2110_21_sender_type.description: ST 2110-21 Sender Type. Indicates the traffic shaping and delivery timing requirements of ST 2110-21 to which the Sender complies.
